mapper.insert: insert into companies (company_id, company_name, company_username, company_password, company_mainaddress, company_detailaddress, company_ceonumber, company_phonenumber) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{mainaddress}, #{detailaddress}, #{ceonumber}, #{phonenumber})
mapper.select: select company_id as id, company_name as name, company_username as username, company_mainaddress as mainaddress, company_detailaddress as detailaddress, company_ceonumber as ceonumber, company_phonenumber as phonenumber from companies

select company_id as id, company_name as name, company_username as username, company_mainaddress as mainaddress, company_detailaddress as detailaddress, company_ceonumber as ceonumber, company_phonenumber as phonenumber, company_password as password from companies where company_username = #{value}
